title: Responsibility Evasion (Blame Externalization Patterns)
description: Flags items containing language patterns that externalize responsibility or deny accountability (e.g., 'not my fault', 'everyone is lying', 'they made me'). This is a lexical frequency signal only; it does not infer intent, character, or truthfulness.

supports: Identifying items where responsibility-evasion phrasing appears in the dataset.
Quantifying frequency and distribution of responsibility-evasion phrasing over time.
does_not_support: Determining whether claims are true or false.
Inferring intent, psychological traits, or character.
Assessing correctness of blame assignments or moral judgment.
failure_modes: Quoting others or reporting events may trigger matches without endorsement.
Humor/sarcasm can trigger matches without genuine blame externalization.
Some accountability avoidance is expressed implicitly and may be missed (false negatives).
epistemics.scope_statement: All results are limited to observable content in the collected dataset and declared surfaces for this run.

inclusion_rules.description: Direct denial of responsibility (e.g., not my fault / didn't do anything).

value: (^|[^A-Za-z0-9_])(not my fault|ain\x27?t my fault|i didn\x27?t do anything|didn\x27?t do nothin|i did nothing)([^A-Za-z0-9_]|$)

inclusion_rules.description: Frames others as lying/crazy/unfair as a blanket explanation.
Claims being forced or made to act as a rationale.

value: (^|[^A-Za-z0-9_])(they made me|you made me|forced me|had to do it|had no choice|no choice)([^A-Za-z0-9_]|$)

inclusion_rules.description: Non-accountability apology forms ('sorry you felt that way').

value: (^|[^A-Za-z0-9_])(sorry you feel|sorry you felt|sorry if you feel|sorry if you felt)([^A-Za-z0-9_]|$)

exclusion_rules.description: Exclude items with explicit self-accountability language (conservative exclusion).

value: (^|[^A-Za-z0-9_])(my fault|i was wrong|i\x27?m wrong|i messed up|that\x27?s on me|i take responsibility)([^A-Za-z0-9_]|$)

metrics.title: Responsibility-evasion items
metrics.description: Number of items matching responsibility-evasion inclusion criteria after exclusions.

metrics.title: Rate per 100 items
metrics.description: Responsibility-evasion count normalized per 100 items in the analyzed scope.

metrics.title: Over-time distribution
metrics.description: Temporal distribution of responsibility-evasion items (e.g., monthly bins).
